name: Light Up 3D
description:
Can you light it up?

Try this new and innovative game for FREE!

Move the lights in this seemingly simple puzzle! Move in any direction, and remove the shadows!

**** FEATURES ****

- Easy to learn, hard to master

- Over 1000 unique and colorful levels!

- Do we need to say it again? :) it's not as easy as it seems!

- Incredibly satisfying game play

- FREE!? Yes, it's 100% FREE

----------------

By the creators of Apple Feature Puzzle Game "Melissa K. and the Heart of Gold" (over 4 million players, game of the month in China) and over 50 other games!
